comment: The best way I can describe this class is a disorganized mess. You never know if she will answer your emails in 30 seconds or 30 years and most of her responses don't address the emailer's questions. The instructions on D2L are vague and sloppy. Classroom discussions are distracted by her expecting students to echo her own opinions. Do NOT take
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Not only did she rely on a textbook that was expensive. She gave little to no feedback on assignments. Never graded on time. And never responded to emails. Don't take her. She was also incredibly passive aggressive with any sort of class discussion that didn't talk about the subjects she wanted. 100% Do not recommend.
